description: This source file provides a service layer for database operations related to users, Jira projects, and Confluence pages, including create, retrieve, update, and list functions.

methods.name: User create_user(db: Session, *, email: str, display_name: Optional[str] = None, jira_token: Optional[str] = None, confluence_token: Optional[str] = None, jira_base_url: Optional[str] = None, confluence_base_url: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Creates a new user or returns the existing user by email, ensuring idempotency.

methods.name: Optional[User] get_user_by_id(db: Session, user_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieves a user record based on the user ID.

methods.name: Optional[User] get_user_by_email(db: Session, email: str)
methods.description: Fetches a user by email if present.

methods.name: List[User] list_users(db: Session)
methods.description: Returns a list of all users.

methods.name: JiraProject upsert_jira_project(db: Session, *, owner_id: int, key: str, name: str, lead: Optional[str] = None, url: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Creates or updates a Jira project based on owner_id and key.

methods.name: List[JiraProject] list_jira_projects_for_user(db: Session, owner_id: int)
methods.description: Lists all Jira projects associated with a given user.

methods.name: ConfluencePage upsert_confluence_page(db: Session, *, owner_id: int, space_key: str, page_id: str, title: str, url: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Creates or updates a Confluence page identified by owner_id, space_key, and page_id.

methods.name: List[ConfluencePage] list_confluence_pages_for_user(db: Session, owner_id: int)
methods.description: Lists Confluence pages associated with a specific user.

ctags.name: create_user
ctags.pattern: /^def create_user(db: Session, *, email: str, display_name: Optional[str] = None,$/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, *, email: str, display_name: Optional[str] = None, jira_token: Optional[str] = None, confluence_token: Optional[str] = None, jira_base_url: Optional[str] = None, confluence_base_url: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: upsert_confluence_page
ctags.pattern: /^def upsert_confluence_page(db: Session, *, owner_id: int, space_key: str, page_id: str,$/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, *, owner_id: int, space_key: str, page_id: str, title: str, url: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: upsert_jira_project
ctags.pattern: /^def upsert_jira_project(db: Session, *, owner_id: int, key: str, name: str,$/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, *, owner_id: int, key: str, name: str, lead: Optional[str] = None, url: Optional[str] = None)
